solution_line_template: There is ${budget} - ${bus_cost} = $<<{budget}-{bus_cost}={available_for_admission}>>{available_for_admission} available to pay for the students' admission fees.

This means they can afford to bring ${available_for_admission} / ${admission_cost_per_student} = <<{available_for_admission}/{admission_cost_per_student}={num_students}>>{num_students} students on the trip.
